name: TinyBadge

href.description: Specify the address of the destination page
href.description_zh: 指定跳转的目标页面地址

is-dot.description: Whether or not to display the mark as a dot
is-dot.description_zh: 是否以小圆点的形式来显示标记

:max.description: Specifies the maximum value for the badge to display, and if the actual badge value is more than that maximum, the number of badges is displayed in the form of a '+' followed by the maximum value, and the value must be of type number
:max.description_zh: 指定徽章显示的最大值，如果实际获取的徽章值超过该最大值，则以最大值后接一个 '+' 的形式显示徽章数，要求 value 是 number 类型

offset.description: Sets the offset of the marker position
offset.description_zh: 设置标记位置的偏移量

target.description: The way in which you are redirected to the target page when you click on the tag is only used if the href attribute is present
target.description_zh: 点击标记时链接到目标页面的跳转方式，仅在 href 属性存在时使用

slots.name: default
slots.description: If the default slot has the data attribute, the default slot does not take effect
slots.description_zh: 默认插槽，有data属性时，默认插槽不生效

description: Badge 展示指定数据信息，如：我的待办数、新任务数等。
description_zh: Badge 展示指定数据信息，如：我的待办数、新任务数等。
